Name: The Longest Love
About the game: Story Brief Yame wakes up from a strange and familiar room. She still vaguely remembered that she seemed to be imprisoned in the room. Every day a blue monster would force her to inject some medicine. This made her feel headache and nausea, and gradually began to lose herself. And on this day, she finally decided to find a way to escape... She tried to avoid the monster... But when she was looking for a way out, she found another sad truth... * The tension of being chased by monsters at any time * Unique Narrative Method * A sad and moving ending
